level.heading: RECORDS OF RESTRICTED USE PESTICIDES (ยง 20-2509)

level.text: Dealers of restricted use pesticides shall keep and maintain for a period of three (3) years records on each transaction involving restricted use pesticides.
A duplicate copy of the records required by ยง 2509.1 shall be transferred to the Director upon request.
Records of restricted use pesticides shall include the following information:
Name and address of purchaser or receiver, including name and customer number of the licensed certified applicator;
Pesticide product sold (the brand name), the EPA registration number, and the type of formulation;

A dealer may not sell or transfer any restricted use pesticide to any person other than a licensed certified applicator or to his or her authorized representative, who shall present the applicator’s proof of certification and license.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 3044 (October 6, 1978), incorporating Proposed Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 2118 (August 25, 1978).
